lead_paragraph: BENDICH--Albert M. June 18, 1929 - January 5, 2015 Dearest Al, It seems like yesterday when you left us. We've lost our brightest light. You've so inspired us in life, by your actions, deeds, words, love and philosophy and will continue to do so - always. Endless love and respect, Pam and your loving family and friends 1/3
